li.label: Werewolf (?)
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] could be a shapeshifter that blends forms between man and wolf. When a special moon rises, [PAWN_pronoun] may have [PAWN_possessive] first horrific transformation, or something else may happen...

li.label: Werewolf (Unblooded)
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is unknowingly a shapeshifter that blends forms between man and wolf. When a special moon rises, [PAWN_pronoun] will have [PAWN_possessive] first horrific transformation.

li.label: Werewolf
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a shapeshifter that blends its form with that of a wolf.

li.label: Werewolf (Sworn)
li.description: Having sworn a blood oath to their clan in good faith, [PAWN_nameDef] is a shapeshifter that blends [PAWN_possessive] form with that of a wolf, and cannot be recruited.

li.label: Werewolf (Metis)
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a genetic abberation known as the Metis. Somewhere in [PAWN_possessive] genetic line, a werewolf mated with a werewolf and forever corrupted their werewolf line. This Werewolf can only transform into the Metis form.
